narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
The facility is applying for a C license to exhibit farm animals to the public.
To obtain a C license the licensing fee must be sent to:
USDA, APHIS, AC
920 Main Campus
Suite 200
Raliegh, NC  27606
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Equine Programs Director.
NO REGULATED ACTIVITIES MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL A VALID USDA LICENSE IS OBTAINED.

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
